product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Underwear T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Offering very light warmth against the skin during activity in cool weather, the men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Underwear T-Shirt is perfect when midweight base layers are too hot. Stretchy, quick-drying and moisture-wicking polyester and spandex fabric offers very light insulation against skin. Odor-resistant fabric treatment helps deter odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Offset seams enhance mobility without chafing. The men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Underwear T-Shirt offers a slim fit.
short_description: Offering very light warmth against the skin during activity in cool weather, the men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Underwear T-Shirt is perfect when midweight base layers are too hot.
